songs.title: You Are So Beautiful
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Liam]
You are so beautiful
To me
You are so beautiful
To me
Can't you see, oh oh

[Chorus: Harry]
You're everything I hope for
You're everything I need, yeah
You are so beautiful to me

[End: Zayn & Harry]
You are so beautiful
To me
Can't you see, oh yeah
You're everything I hope for
You're every, everything I need
You are so beautiful to me
